## Exercises{.smaller}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}
- Exercises are based on the single cell data of the [Spatial Skin Atlas](https://spatial-skin-atlas.cellgeni.sanger.ac.uk/)
- Check the [publication](https://www.pnas.org/doi/10.1073/pnas.2313326120) by Garnier et.al.^[C. Ganier, P. Mazin, G. Herrera-Oropeza, X. Du-Harpur, M. Blakeley, J. Gabriel, A.V. Predeus, B. Cakir, M. Prete, N. Harun, J. Darrigrand, A. Haiser, S. Wyles, T. Shaw, S.A. Teichmann, M. Haniffa, F.M. Watt, & M.D. Lynch, Multiscale spatial mapping of cell populations across anatomical sites in healthy human skin and basal cell carcinoma, Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U.S.A. 121 (2) e2313326120, https://doi.org/10.1073/pnas.2313326120 (2024).] to answer the questions.
- The dataset has been published as `AnnData` object (scverse-python) and was converted into `Seurat` object for this workshop
- Exercises follow a standard [Seurat workflow]([Seurat](https://satijalab.org/seurat/articles/pbmc3k_tutorial)))

:::
